Hi everyone,
Reached my goal of selling three postcards, congrats to the lucky buyers who took home a few pieces from my personal collection! My flash sale is now CLOSED.
Jeff

[quote name="jb217676" post=2290184]Hi everyone,
I'm looking to sell 2 or 3 vintage postcards from my personal stash, check out the link below and see if anything is of interest. If you're interested in something shoot me an offer, and I'm sure we can make a deal. The only two postcards that are not available are the 1909 Brush Ty Cobb and the C. 1930's Babe Ruth RPPC. Shoot me a PM if you're interested in adding a sweet postcard or two to your collection!
Jeff

Wow You have a great vintage collection

GLWS

posts.post_title: FS: A Few Postcards From My Personal Collection!
posts.post_content:
I don’t expect this opportunity to last long. 

Great PCs. I especially like the ones with the snapshot feel, like Groves and Hacks along with many more.

Thanks guys! I've sold two already, only looking to move one more. Still love my postcards but need the funds for some of my other collecting adventures! I expect to close this thread sometime this afternoon.

Wow, there are so Knee I would love to have, but I just completed a purchase. 1912 Boston American Speaker is sure eye catching! 

Sent from my SM-G9900 using Tapatalk

Hi everyone,
Reached my goal of selling three postcards, congrats to the lucky buyers who took home a few pieces from my personal collection! My flash sale is now CLOSED.

Wow, such great images on those postcards... you may have just pulled me into expansion of my collection focus!
